name: Trella
headline: Trella is a platform that connects shippers to carriers. Trellaâ¦
description: Trella is a technology platform that connects shippers to carriers. Trella empowers drivers, improves their efficiency, boosts their earnings and utilization as well as provide job opportunities. Trella also works to reduce costs for shippers, introduce a transparent pricing structure, provide them with a more reliable source of carriers while allowing them to track their shipments in real-time as well as report key insights on their transportation trends and performance.

founders.name: Omar Hagrass, Founder
founders.description: Omar is the founder and CEO of Trella. Prior to Trella, Hagrass was a launch and expansion manager where he led the launch of Uber Eats in EMEA and launched more than 50 cities across UAE, South Africa, Egypt and the United Kingdom.

![](https://www.trella.app/images/shipper-brands/shipper-brand-26.png)
#### WHY TRELLA?
Ship with usCarry with us
#### Reliability
###### We’ve got you covered!
We prioritize your customers and provide hassle-free movement through the supply chain, ensuring scalability, high fulfillment rate, and allowing you to focus on your customers, business, and success.
#### Quality
###### Quality in loads, quality in drivers, quality in everything!
We guarantee high-quality service by prioritizing on-time performance, efficient internal operations, reliable support, and maintaining strict standards for carriers through our control tower staffed with experienced professionals.
#### Visibility
###### At Trella, we’re big fans of transparency!
Trella's digital platform offers transparency, visibility, and control in the logistics industry through GPS tracking, live updates, and a centralized dashboard for efficient management and performance analysis.
#### Transparency
###### The more you know, the better!
your past and upcoming loads, including relevant documents and financial information. You can also view all pickup and drop-off location details through the application.
#### Availability
###### Maximize truck utilization!
On time performance, internal operations By connecting to our load marketplace, you will have access to a variety of loads tailored to your needs and requirements. This enables you to utilize your truck(s) more efficiently by concentrating on the high-quality loads that matter most to you.
#### Flexibility
###### Choose the loads that make the most sense for you!
With Trella, you get to choose the loads you're most comfortable with as you get to see the location, pick-up, and drop-off dates, specific requirements, and load price. The variety of demands enables you to focus on the requirements you prioritize the most.
#### WHAT IS TRELLA?
###### Trella is a platform that connects shippers to carriers, with the aim of creating transparency, efficiency, and reliability, empowering carriers to find regular work with a multitude of shippers. while allowing shippers to book affordable loads, minimize matching time and have greater visibility on their shipments.
#### TRELLA'S EDGE
#### Load Insurance Coverage
We provide insurance coverage for commodities being transported, giving you peace of mind and ensuring your shipments are protected throughout the transportation process. With this added layer of security, your goods are handled with utmost care and minimize any potential risks or losses
#### EPODs
Trella offers electronic PODs (Proof Of Delivery). The migration from physical PoDs to EPoDs can help in streaming the delivery process and reduce paperwork, in addition to helping businesses operate more efficiently and cost-effectively.
#### Digital transformation
Trella's tech-enabled platform revolutionizes the logistics industry by streamlining the trucking experience and eliminating unnecessary touchpoints, From load creation to carrier matching, pick-up and drop-off load traceability, and payment processes, our digital platform optimizes the entire logistics cycle, ensuring a seamless and efficient experience for shippers.
#### PRESS
###### Stories about Trella that we especially love.
![](https://www.trella.app/images/press/press-forbes.svg)
###### “The interest in our solution has been overwhelming, both from businesses who want to use our technology and from truckers who are getting significantly more value and more consistent flow of business through our platform. We’re optimizing truckers’ routes so they’re no longer driving empty.”
[Read more](https://www.trella.app/<https:/www.forbesmiddleeast.com/leadership/entrepreneurship/egypts-trella-secures-more-than-600000-in-pre-seed-round-by-algebra-ventures/>)
![](https://www.trella.app/images/press/press-techcrunch.svg)

generated_description:
**Trella: Streamlining Logistics in the Middle East**

Trella, founded in 2019 and acclaimed as part of Y Combinator’s Batch S19, is making waves in the logistics world. Based in Cairo, Egypt, with a team of about 50, Trella connects shippers to carriers through a tech-forward platform that enhances transparency and efficiency.

**Mission and Functionality**

Trella isn’t just another logistics company; it’s a solution that empowers drivers while providing shippers with cost-effective and reliable options. Its platform allows carriers to maximize their utilization and earnings, whereas shippers benefit from real-time tracking, a transparent pricing structure, and insights into their transportation performance. The platform's aim is to minimize the matching time for loads, making logistics not only easier but smarter.

**Key Offerings and Benefits**

The platform boasts several features designed to create a seamless experience:
- **Load Insurance Coverage**: Ensuring your cargo is protected, adding an extra layer of security.
- **Electronic Proof of Delivery (EPOD)**: This digital shift reduces paperwork and speeds up processes.
- **Real-Time Tracking**: GPS visibility paired with live updates means that both shippers and carriers can manage their operations efficiently.

Trella prioritizes quality and reliability by maintaining high standards across its internal operations, ensuring that both variable load demands and operational efficiency are met. 

**The Edge of Trella**

Trella differentiates itself with a focus on:
- **Transparency**: Users have access to detailed tracking of both past and upcoming loads.
- **Flexibility**: Carriers can choose loads that fit their needs, allowing for better decision-making based on individual circumstances.
- **Community Engagement**: They not only optimize routes but also create platforms for discussion and education around challenges in the logistics space.

**Market Presence and Future**

Operating currently in Egypt, Saudi Arabia, and the UAE, Trella is poised for growth in the logistics marketplace, tackling significant inefficiencies with innovation and a customer-centric approach. Whether you're a shipper seeking reliable carriers or a driver looking for more consistent work, Trella's platform offers a compelling solution.

In an environment where logistics can often feel opaque and cumbersome, Trella is championing clarity and connectivity—one load at a time.

To learn more or to start leveraging their platform, visit [Trella's website](https://www.trella.app/).
